name: Ircbot
body:
A small IRC robot in Python based on Twisted Words.
The default modules currently support the following commands:
###Brain Commands
Get/Set/Delete settings used by other plugins
* botname: set variable value
* botname: get variable
* botname: del variable

###Idle tracking
The bot will watch how much time you spend idle and you will level up the more time you spend idle.  Players of [IdleRPG](http://idlerpg.net/) will recognize this but the big difference is that there is no penalty for actually participating in the channel.

You can set your player's class by using the Brain.

* botname set idler_class [whatever you want]

You can also see the top idle players.

* botname idlers

###ASCII Art
The bot can emit ASCII art to the channel or provide a list of available art.

* botname: ascii [art]
* botname: ascii list

###Impersonation Commands
Have the bot pull a quote from various people out of it's brain
* botname: be [name]

There are a lot of names that are valid, try archer!

###Debian Bugs
Saying 'debbugs [bug number]' anywhere in a channel with the bot will cause it to emit information on that bug.

###Sending SMS
This can take advantage of the 'mobile' variable stored in the Brain, so if you want to get SMS messages from the bot make sure you ''set mobile [yourphonenumber]''.  The format '+12125551234' is suggested.
* botname: sms [nickname or phone number] [message]

###URL Tracking
Urls sent to the channel are caught, tracked and shortened for easy copy/pasting.

###Surprises!
There are a few other easter eggs, using the bot is the best way to find out what fun could be hidden!
